Method Detail

getAnyRouter

public MongoDBRouter getAnyRouter()
Returns:
One of the routers in the cluster if available, null otherwise

getAnyRunningRouter

public MongoDBRouter getAnyRunningRouter()
Returns:
One of the running routers in the cluster. This should only be used to add shards as it does not guarantee that the router is available for CRUD operations

getRouters

public java.util.Collection getRouters()
Returns:
All routers in the cluster
